vote.title: Authorize a twenty-year facility use agreement, with two ten-year renewal options with Family Gateway, Inc for approximately 72,032 square feet of land improved with a 34,109 square foot former hotel located at 19373 Preston Road, to be used as a facility to promote and address the needs for families and individuals experiencing homelessness for the period July 1, 2023 through June 30, 2043 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
